summary: Immune and full Restoring while Transforming
descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD OVER NEXUS MOD MANAGER SEEMS TO BE BUG, i don\'t know to fix this, maby someone can give me advice, please download manuel.

I\'m new to Modding and this is my first Mod for Skyrim, so what does it do?

This is a small Mod i made, it makes your Vampirelord immune while transformating and restore your Health, Stamina, Magicka.

The only change i made are RestoreHealthFFSelf and RestoreStanimaFFSelf Duration able, and then i put the Restore Magicka, Health and Stamina in the Transformingspell make it for 8 seconds and up to 5000 (should be enough).

Installation:
Simple, put \"VampireLordImmune8secall.esp\" it into Skyrim/Data - Folder and activate it.

Uninstallation:
Even more Simple, delete the File \"VampireLordImmune8secall.esp\"

Compatibility
Maby with Mods that edit the RestoreHealhtFFSelf, ...MagickaFFSelf, ...StanimaFFSelf, but it should be quit compatibility.

Bug
And the only Bug I found is that the Vampire didn\'t equipt a Spell, Land and be back in the Air and you have your spells equipt

If you would rate my \"Work\" or leave a Comments it would be great, if you find any Bug please tell me. If you want to edit this or use it in other Mods, give me Credits and a link to your new Mod, more i don\'t need.
Sorry for my bad English, normaly i speak German.

Other Mods:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24267 - Werewolf Immune Mod
author: Niak
